description:
Ema and Ryuka`s younger brother, and a very ordinary student. I also feel small-minded because my two older sisters are so great. My parents are working overseas, and even though the three of us live together, I am solely responsible for the household chores. 
He was used to Ema`s teasing and Ryuka`s bullying. I recently got a girlfriend and I`m so happy...
name: Himeki Mizuki
